headline.main: C.I.O. IS EXPECTED TO BACK ROOSEVELT; Convention Stand on Major Policies Indicated After Murray Conference CALL STRESSES DANGERS Security of Nation Threatened, Asserts Statement Setting Nov. 17 as Meeting Date

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 22 -- That President Roosevelt's foreign and defense policies will be endorsed at the fourth annual convention of the Congress of Industrial Organizations was the expectation reported here today following a conference of C.I.O. division chiefs with President Philip Murray.
